Contemporary Beliefs Syncretism Today, Cherokee spirituality blends ancient cosmology new understandings. interpret Pleiades metaphorically call decolonize mind return sacred ecological balance. Others adopt syncretic interpretations, merging traditional beliefs pan-Indigenous star lore even extraterrestrial theories though latter debated among cultural purists Stanley, n.d.; Anderson, 2019.
